data.title: Katy Perry Biography
data.meta_description: Katy Perry Biography  - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Katy Perry Loren Al Hamwi English Communication II 20th October, 2016

2. Katy Perry

3. Early Life of Katy Perry * KatyPerrywas born on the 25th of October 1984 in Santa Barbara , California. * Katyhas two other siblings. She has a sister named AngelaHudson and a brother named DavidHudson. * At seventeen Katyleft her home for Los Angeles, where she worked with Glen Ballard, on an album for Island Records.

4. * I chose Katybecause she is different from other artists because her songs are more meaningful and because she has a special talent of communicating with her audience that we all admire. * I also chose Katybecause I love her style of clothing. What she wears is colorful and fun. Why Katy?

5. What type of music does she sing… * KatyPerry sings pop, rock, dance and Gospel genres of music. * KatyPerry writes many of her own songs, so all the material is her original and very much her own flavor.

6. * Katy’sbirth name is KathrynHudson, KatyPerry is just her stage name so that people can notice her. * As a teenager Katy was influenced by church music because she was the daughter of a pastor. KatyPerry took singing lessons at the age of nine!!

7. Career * On Katy’s ‘Warped Tour’ in 2008 she performed a song called ‘I kissed a Girl’. * ‘I kissed a Girl’ reached the top charts in the summer holidays in 2008 in the Billboard top 100.

8. Highlights And Awards * Katy’s song ‘I kissed a Girl’ earned her a nomination for Best Female Pop Vocal in 2009. She has been nominated 8 times for Grammy Awards. * KatyPerry was named ‘Artist of the Year’ by MTV on 2011. * KatyPerry has sold to date, over 27.6 million digital tracks in America and 4.3 million albums Worldwide, and 49.8 million digital Tracks worldwide.

9. * KatyPerry has completed a 3D Biopic-concert film ‘Katy Perry: Part of Me’ in 2012. * She has won five singles that have reached number one! * She won an award for the most fireworks used in a performance. * Her last award was in 2013 for ‘Favorite Female Singer’.

10. Katy Perry… * KatyPerry was the voice of Smurfette in ‘ The Smurfs (1-2)’ * She was married to British comedian, Russell Brand from 2010 to 2012, and they divorced. * KP4 is going to be released in few weeks.

11. Insights on our artist… * Music can change your life if you can reach for your dreams like KatyPerry. * Being different from other artists is a good thing because it makes You unique and special.

12. Thank You for Your Attention and Time
